data.name: ANNO: Mutationem Demo
data.detailed_description:
In this Demo you will expect:

- Around 40 minutes of gameplay
- Leading into the story and mysteries
- To explore one of the many cities in the game
- Interact with NPCs, including the cats
- Try out combats and weapons
data.about_the_game:
In this Demo you will expect:

- Around 40 minutes of gameplay
- Leading into the story and mysteries
- To explore one of the many cities in the game
- Interact with NPCs, including the cats
- Try out combats and weapons
data.short_description: Demo version of ANNO: Mutationem, an action-adventure game with RPG elements set in a cyberpunk world

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 1030
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
